TopicTitle: There is a Zombie apocalypse. You only have your profile picture to protect you. How do you fare?

Articles.Content:
Im safe.

pppsssh humans are parasites anyways.

Well, I'm screwed.
Maybe if I blinded them...

3 minutes ago, Dark Junior said:

Well, I'm screwed.
Maybe if I blinded them...

Looks like good Zombie camouflage to me... lol....

(May or may not have just changed my pic just for this XD)

My trusty pet owl would slash all the zombies to bits! Then it'd have to sleep and I'd probably die......

Oh, carp. Mine is just a depiction of a depiction of a sword...

I'll just say that the sword shows up. 

That's good. It's one of the better weapons during a zombie apocalypse (although spears are better, atlatls as well...). I guess I also get thunderbolts...

And if it's not going to be the sword, I get an entire Space Wing to myself. Hopefully they have some kind of defensive weapons...
I can make it really cold. Do zombies freeze?

I ask the zombie - "Have you seen, the yellow sign?"

Zombie is now under my command. A new dynasty begins...
(Silently traces the sign into a notebook).
Load up on the armaments and max out the fuel, I got a P-47 Thunderbolt.

I got a solar spectrum. I hope the part under red will cook them or something.

Although, if it means "a physical 2D profile picture" then I have no idea. What colours are zombies attracted to and what colours they are afraid of ?

Edited August 26, 2017 by YNM

I have a Rainbow Yoshi

 

He's Invincible, I plow through the zombies on top of Yoshi. 

Spoiler

here's some music to play while picturing this scene

 

 

Edited October 21, 2017 by ModerndayLink
Well I'm screwed...

Well, short of a club I can't outrun them. Probably dead within a day.

But I'll look good dying.

 

Edited October 21, 2017 by GDJ
Just a "bit" of tweakscaling , and I crash into the earth and kill all the zombies.

I am out on a barge with a falcon 9 booster. As long as I never run out of supplies and the barge doesn’t capsize, I am fine.

Fire

I have.....a gas mask.

Um....

 

Halp

Apparently I have a 2040's era (or was it 2050's, I dunno?) or thereabouts peacekeeping air force whose aircraft are piloted by neural mind-machine interface, although its effective strength (and implications of corruption in the ranks) depends on whether one prefers the North American or Japanese version of it. 

Either way by implication I get my hands on an Aurora hypersonic fighter-attack craft and the hyper-internet. 

I think I'll be okay. (And I'll have a lot of... ahem, Youtube videos and the like to keep me company while carpet bombing the undead.)

1 hour ago, Earthlinger said:

I have.....a gas mask.

Um....

 

Halp

You don't have to worry about any airborne vectors of zombiefication, at least. As for halp... I think I also have transport VTOLs? (Or did I shoot them down in Mission 20-something?)
I have... a MEGA Charizard. I do... pretty well, I suppose, pretty well like an AK-47 in a swordfight.

On 8/11/2017 at 4:29 PM, KAL 9000 said:

I would tempt the zombies with my brain, and lead them into the nuclear explosion. 

Everyone dies.

If Jeb has a brain...
I'm, not sure if I would survive or not.

I'm on a moon, outside my base, with full on water mining capabilities, hydroponics, aeroponics, fuel mining, and fuel refining capabilities. I am saluting the booster which got me here and I can refine some uranium into uranium fuel, print some LH2 tanks and send an unmanned suicide run using and a 10,000 Megaton bomb. Bye Zombos!

(
1. Looks ar the thread title.
2. Tries to imagine anyone who has googled a picture:
"moonbase water mining capabilities hydroponics aeroponics fuel mining refining salute booster uranium LH2 tank unmanned suicide 10000 megaton"

What a hard but interesting life probably had the person making such google queries...
)

Edited December 31, 2017 by kerbiloid
I've got a stupidly spinning squid. At least I can die laughing and dizzy.
I have Duna and Ike. Um, Maybe I can smash Duna into the planet and destroy all life (and undead life) on the planet.

Well, let’s see what I have here...an entire star and a few huge planets. The only option is to make things a bit...um...compact for Earth and all those objects. While the resulting explosions would likely defeat any zombies, I don’t think the 7,500,000,000+ living people would be too happy. Or in one piece, for that matter.
